mapper.select: select sum(pl.amount * p.product_price) as totalPrice from product p, bill b, purchaseList pl where p.product_id = pl.product_id AND b.b_id = pl.b_id and (b.publish_date like concat(#{year}, '%') or b.publish_date like concat(#{year}-1, '%') or b.publish_date like concat(#{year}-2, '%')) group by year(b.publish_date)
